text: Hobby Lobby Stores, Inc., formerly Hobby Lobby Creative Centers, is a private for-profit corporation which owns a chain of American arts and crafts stores with a volume of over $5 billion in 2018. The store has been criticized over their founder's and owner's anti-homosexuality and extreme religious views. ==References== Category:20th-century establishments in Oklahoma Category:1972 establishments in the United States Category:Retail markets Category:Companies based in Oklahoma Category:Oklahoma City
title: Hobby Lobby
